name: tiny_mod
description: Settings UI and utils for Melvor mods

scripts.build: npm run webpack && npm run build-script
scripts.build-script: cp ${npm_package_config_tinyMod}/scripts/build.js build.js && node build.js ${npm_package_config_tinyMod} && rm build.js
scripts.dist: npm run version && npm run build
scripts.version: cp ${npm_package_config_tinyMod}/scripts/increment-version.js increment-version.js && node increment-version.js && rm increment-version.js
scripts.webpack: cp ${npm_package_config_tinyMod}/config/webpack.config.js webpack.config.js && cp ${npm_package_config_tinyMod}/config/tsconfig.json tsconfig.json && webpack && rm webpack.config.js
